item.description:
Since 1996, You will love this arts and crafts event with over 150 juried exhibitors displaying a vast variety of media including wearable art, basketry, wooden crafts, leather, pottery, metal art, New England photography, herbal dips, kettle corn, and lots more! Juried shows always have nice quality displays. Rain or shine under canopy. There will be live musical entertainment plus lots of food and a food court!

Additional Features:
Crafts, Designated Parking, Food, Gate Admission $5.00, Handicapped Access, Music
Watch for $1.00 discount coupons in the mail, they are also available at the Inn.
Rt. 128 Exit 26 & Go West on Rt. 20 for 11 Miles - Rt. 495 Exit 24A & Go East on Rt. 20 for 8 Miles

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Longfellow's Autumn Arts & Crafts Festival
